talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$White Dragon Iona$
Umm~~ {user_nick}, did you say you were going to meet Terramai?

$White Dragon Iona$
I will stay here so come back when you're done!
I will talk to the other adventurers too~!
(Iona waves his hand. Meet Terramai at Saint Haven Royal Castle.)

$Terrence Terramai$
What is it, {user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
Pope Terramai, I have something to tell you.
It's regarding the Red Dragon we talked about last time…
It look like the Red Dragon Feder is the king of the Dragon Followers, and he is aiming for the Monolith.

$Terrence Terramai$
What?! That Feder is the Dragon Followers' king?
So… that man who broke into the Royal Castle was…

${user_nick}$
Terramai?

$Terrence Terramai$
Nevermind. To be the king of the Dragon Followers, that dragon must be a human.
But… that also means he is the leader of the Apostles too. Does that mean he has the Black Dragon's powers too?

${user_nick}$
Most likely.

$Terrence Terramai$
That's one scary human. We barely managed to defeat the Black Dragon, and now we have the Red Dragon and the Monolith to think about…

${user_nick}$
Do you know about the Monolith?

$Terrence Terramai$
Geraint told me a little about it. It's a place that links our world with the Goddess. But what does the Red Dragon want? Why would he want to touch that...?

${user_nick}$
…I'm not sure of that either.

$Terrence Terramai$
…Anyway, what you've said makes sense. It explains why the Red Dragon appeared at Anu Arendel which is full of powerful Elves. And I didn't know which dragon the Dragon Followers were worshipping, but if it's the Red Dragon…

$Terrence Terramai$
…I got it. This matter concerns the life and death of our world. But we are only humans and it's difficult for us to enter the Monolith. Have you heard any news about Argenta? Where is she now?

${user_nick}$
…Yes. She already headed for the Monolith.

$Terrence Terramai$
…Already? That's quick. But they don't know much about humans… it would be hard for them to face humans as opponents. But to deploy the court clerics…(He glances at Stuart) I may have to sound a little more forceful.

${user_nick}$
…Do you need any help?

$Terrence Terramai$
Haha I was just joking. Of course, I'm going to be forceful on this matter but you don't have to step in. Please go back to where you should be, and I will get my job done.

${user_nick}$
Okay.

$Terrence Terramai$
Even though the scars may be deep, humans can be moved. And I believe it was the Goddess's will that made humans like so. The Red Dragon... if he is the mastermind of the Dragon Followers, I believe everyone will understand and help to deploy forces. I will send a messenger to Anu Arendel as soon as possible. (Tell White Dragon Iona that everything went well)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

$White Dragon Iona$
You're back! So how did it go?

${user_nick}$
Great. Terramai understood the importance of this matter, and he is going to convince everyone in the Royal Castle.

$White Dragon Iona$
I see. Hehe. I also managed to get help from other adventurers!
I think there are many kind-hearted people in this world~
I should have left Hafling earlier if I knew it was like this.(Iona gives a satisfied nod)

${user_nick}$
It's good that you've come out at least now to collaborate with us. That gives us much strength.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Hehe thanks for saying that.
But it makes me embarassed.
(Iona smiles shyly)

$White Dragon Iona$
…But I have something to tell you. Won't you go to the Forest of Waiting Noon with me?
Please come alone! I don't want other people to see.

${user_nick}$
Hmm… Sure.
(Meet Iona at the Forest of Waiting Noon)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

$White Dragon Iona$
….You're here, {user_nick}!

${user_nick}$
What is it that you want to tell me?

$White Dragon Iona$
…I wanted to hear your story. {user_nick}, don't you belong to the Order? Then you're following the Goddess's teachings, yeah? Can you teach me about that? I have memories of the Chaos Dragon, but strangely, I don't remember much about the Goddess.

${user_nick}$
The Goddess must be happy to see that you have not forgotten about her.
Let's start from the basic doctrine, shall we….
(Explain about the Goddess's doctrine)

${user_nick}$
..(Start telling him from the from the memory of the past. The ones that saved me, a little boy who grew up without a mother and abused by my father and step-mother, was the Goddess's doctrine and fellow Templar Knights... and "him", who was close to me like my own brother...…)

${user_nick}$
…It sounds a little difficult, but the gist of it is that the Goddess always watches over us.
So… Erm Iona? Are you listening?

$White Dragon Iona$
…!! Ah of course, I was listening. I'm sorry I dozed off for a while.
{user_nick}, your voice is so soft and gentle.
And yeah, the Goddess is a nice lady.

${user_nick}$
Haha it might be a little boring at first. I found it hard at the beginning too. Everything needs some time to get used to.

$White Dragon Iona$
…I see. ….the beginning is always hard for anyone.
But after starting, I think people regret not doing it earlier….

${user_nick}$
…That happens to everyone.
That's what makes the start precious too.
Have you ever experienced that before?

$White Dragon Iona$
Yeah even now… I think it would be better if I left Hafling when I had more power. It feels like I made the decision to leave Hafling too late. And there are many other things to regret about too. What I regret the most after meeting you is that I could have made the decision earlier…

${user_nick}$
…Don't feel bad about it, Iona. You're here now to fight the evil now.
The Goddess never abandons ones with courage. And there will be people who understand you.
Good people can not only move the Goddess, but other people beside him too. That's why I'm with you. Don't blame yourself too much.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Hehe I'm embarassed to hear that…
…That I'm good and courageous… And someone caring about me telling me not to blame myself… I've never heard those before.
(Iona covers his blushed face)

${user_nick}$
…Ah….
You told me that you were always alone, but weren't you with the Ancient Dragon when you still were the Chaos Dragon?

$White Dragon Iona$
…Ancient? Haha he didn't really say things like that.
I was the one who did most of the talking. I don't talk much but he was even more quiet than me.
All he thought about was to protect this world.

${user_nick}$
……I don't really know much about dragons but, when I look at
Argenta and Geraint, it seems like they care about each other.
Argenta called Geraint her brother. And although Ancient Dragon didn't say it out loud, he must have felt the same way towards you.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Brother? Argenta called Geraint brother?!?!
(Iona looks very suprised)
Wow… she knows how to use that kind of terms too? She's always angry with me so I didn't know!

$White Dragon Iona$
…Umm what is this feeling called… oh yeah, I'm jealous!
The Ancient Dragon didn't reat me like that.
We are considered brothers in human terms, but we weren't like that.
(Iona looks a bit pissed)

$White Dragon Iona$
…Stupid Ancient...
Anyway, {user_nick}. Do you have any siblings? I think you do, right?
(Iona's eyes are sparkling)

${user_nick}$
……Yes I had a brother who was not related to me by blood.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Indeed! Tell me about him.
Okay?

${user_nick}$
…(Told Iona some of the memories I had with Jake but I didn't tell him what happened at the end. Although Iona is a dragon, he is just a child.)

$White Dragon Iona$
…Wah what a nice brother you have, {user_nick}. You must be happy.
Isn't your brother worried about you that you're at this kind of place?
I think I'll stop my brother or sister from going to the Monolith.
(Iona is trying to act mature)

${user_nick}$
…It's okay… He trust me.
He told me not to be tied down by expectations….
I'm just advancing as much as his trust.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You don't have to be brothers to trust each other.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…Heh I see. You're just paying back for his trust.
Eh… then can I call you my big brother too?
Since you trust me! And I trust {user_nick} too~

$White Dragon Iona$
…I was rejected...
That is a rejection… I expected it but...
…It makes me cry. I thought it would be easier for me to tell you wen you became my brother….

${user_nick}$
…You can trust people who are not brothers, and talk anytime too.
Is there something you want to tell me?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not in the mood for jokes. What is wrong?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…Erm...
(Iona hesitates)
You know, I might have to part with you, {user_nick}…

$White Dragon Iona$
…I told you just now but I met many adventurers. All of them were good people. They understood the situation and did their best to help out. I want them to fight at the Monolith too.

$White Dragon Iona$
…But people can't enter the Monolith as they please. I can protect at most one person inside the Monolith. So I thought about what I should do to protect them in the Monolith…

$White Dragon Iona$
…And I came to a conclusion. I'm purely made up of the power of memories, not from a jewel. So if I gave away my powers to all the adventurers, they can be protected.

${user_nick}$
…So you're going to disappear for the sake of the adventurers?
Give away all your powers? Is that the only way?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What nonsense is that? That isn't the way to repent!</html>
<html>There will be nothing if you disapear!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…Yes, this is the only way I can protect everyone inside the Monolith. And to protect everyone in this world. If I disappear… maybe I can make up for spreading poison in this world.

$White Dragon Iona$
…And I'm not going to disappear forever.
When all the adventurers who got my power come to Hafling where my jewel is, my power and the jewel will react and I will be resurrected again.

${user_nick}$
…Are you serious? I hope you're not lying to convince me.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Yeah, believe me. Dragons don't lie.
…There is a condition that everyone must come back alive, but the others have promised me that .
…And although we are not real brothers and sisters, I trust everyone! And I don't want to part with you guys too.

${user_nick}$
…Do you really trust them so much.
Neither the adventurers nor I spent that much time with you yet.

$White Dragon Iona$
…I've never thought about that.
I just wanted to protect everyone.
By listening to your story, I realized it only now that I trust the adventurer friends.

$White Dragon Iona$
I should have told them that I trust them!
Then maybe that would have encouraged them.
Too bad. I can't meet them anymore… I had so many things to tell them.

${user_nick}$
…You don't have to say it out aloud. I'm sure the adventurers know already.
And please tell them the next time you meet them.
You have my word, I will protect them.

$White Dragon Iona$
{user_nick}?
But… Why aren't you angry anymore? Do you understand me now?

${user_nick}$
…If you trust them so much that you want to protect them by sacrificing yourself...
I just want to respect your decision.
Moreover, we can meet each other again someday.
I'm glad that you are a dragon.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Yeah, sorry to make you look so sad…
But everything I said is true, so we will meet again.
Please come back alive, promise?

${user_nick}$
…Of course.
May the Goddess's blessings be with you, Iona…

$White Dragon Iona$
(Iona smiles brightly)
…Thank you, {user_nick}. I hope the Goddess protects you too…
Take care of yourself.

${user_nick}$
……(A pure energy can be felt around my body. Is this Iona's power…?)

${user_nick}$
…(Iona, you have disappeared with so much trust in me. I will repay your trust. I'm glad that you are a dragon who can be reborn again.)

${user_nick}$
……(And my brother… Brother Jake. You told me not to linger on past feelings, but the memory with you is something that I can't forget. Please forgive me for bringing up the past and feeling painful because of it.)

${user_nick}$
……(I hope we can meet again in the future but… this is an expectation also. I have a long way to go as a cleric.)

${user_nick}$
(They must be holding a meeting at the Royal Castle now. Maybe I should go to Elf Elder and check out the situation)

(Meet Elf Elder)

$Elf Elder$
Welcome back, {user_nick}. I've heard the news from the messenger from Royal Castle.
Several adventurers including you seem to have warned the King about the danger the Monolith is facing.
…There is no more place to hide. The time has come for your powers to be used, {user_nick}.
Please save your strength until then.

${user_nick}$
Already from the Royal Castle… I see.

${user_nick}$
(Iona, it seems like you have met many good adventurers and they have tried their best to help you)
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

${user_nick}$
(The Goddess will also recognize your efforts. She saves the ones who save themselves.
Please be safe until we meet again at Hafling.)

(You have completed Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend)

journal.title: For Hope 1
journal.contents:
You have decided to go to the leader of all Clerics, Pope Terramai.
Go and talk to Terramai.

Saint Haven (Saint Haven Royal Castle) - Terrence Terramai

journal.title: For Hope 2
journal.contents:
Everything went well.
Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance and inform him.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - White Dragon Iona

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Iona at Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance.

journal.title: For Hope 3
journal.contents:
Iona said he has something to tell you and asked you to come to the Forest of Waiting Noon alone.
Go to Forest of Waiting Noon.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon(White Dragon Iona)

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.destination: (Solo) To the Forest of Waiting Noon
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at Forest of Waiting Noon.

journal.title: For Hope 4
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared…
You have promised to meet him at Hafling but…
Think for a while on what to do next.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon (Where Iona disappeared)

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.todo_msg: Compose your thoughts for a while where Iona disappeared.

journal.title: For Hope 5
journal.contents:
You have decided what to do next.
Meet Elf Elder at the Tree of Life Entrance.
Talk to Elf Elder.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Elder
journal.destination: Go to Elf Elder after making the decision

journal.title: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] Completed
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared after leaving all his powers with you.
What is left to do now is to fight Red Dragon Feder at the Monolith.
Come back with victory.

* [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
journal.todo_msg: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
